title: #4 CLIPPERS at #2 SUNS | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | June 22, 2021
author: NBA
description:
#4 CLIPPERS at #2 SUNS | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | June 22, 2021

Jae Crowder inbounded the ball to Deandre Ayton for the dunk with 0.7 seconds remaining in regulation to lift the Phoenix Suns over the LA Clippers, 104-103, in Game 2. Deandre Ayton recorded a playoff career-high 24 PTS, along with 14 REB for the Suns, while Cameron Payne added a playoff career-high 29 PTS, along with 9 AST in the victory. Paul George tallied 26 PTS, 6 REB and 6 AST for the Clippers. The Suns lead this best-of-seven series, 2-0.
